title: Setup Express server
description:
Initialize the Node.js project and set up a basic Express server.

Requirements:
- Initialize package.json
- Install Express and development dependencies
- Create server.js with basic Express setup
- Add npm scripts for starting the server
- Server should listen on port 3000
- Add basic health check endpoint (GET /health)

Acceptance Criteria:
- Server starts without errors
- GET /health returns 200 OK with {"status": "ok"}
- npm start runs the server
- npm run dev runs with nodemon for development
notes: Started work on Express server setup. Created package.json with Express dependencies and npm scripts. Implemented server.js with basic Express setup and health check endpoint. Server listens on port 3000.

criteria: server.js created and starts without errors
npm start and npm run dev scripts work
